website_summaries.verdict: The perfect slipper if you're more likely to wear them outside the house than in.
pros: Durable clog design works well outside
Cushioned insole feels luxurious but offers good support
They stretch to fit your feet
cons: Can fit tight at first until they've conformed to your feet

customer_reviews.title: You can only buy real UGG by traveling to Australia and watch out fake ugg in Australia too, sigh
customer_reviews.text: It’s not UGG from Australia. After some research it’s some US company registered the name before the real UGG from Australia and cheaply made in China and then now some in Vietnam. I have seen real UGG from Australia and they are awesome. These are legally fake UGG. Stay away. The “fur” fell off. Fit too small. Smells chemicals. Not safe wear barefoot. Never trust made in China or Vietnam. Real UGG does not hide where fur connected to skin at top openings but these do , what do they try to hide? Apparently poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C

customer_reviews.title: Look great, questioning authenticity
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel like a genuine well made product. I'm confused though, because it has a booklet inside that guides you to a site on how to tell if they’re fake, and some things don't add up. Will update when more info is found.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Grohl

customer_reviews.title: Size down if you plan on wearing them without socks!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great! The fur is soft and the color is beautiful. I’m a size 9 in women’s for Nike and Adidas shoes and a size 10 in Vans. Some people prefer wearing these slippers with or without socks. That being said, if you plan on wearing these slippers WITHOUT socks, I recommend getting a size smaller. My heels come out just a bit but I don’t mind because I always wear socks.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: By Ugg not real
customer_reviews.text: So i decided to try the ugg sold on amazon this time thinking they were authentic i get it i couldn’t fit them and i already have two pairs of this style in different colors i always get the same size there’s a visible difference i turn the shoe over it says by ugg unlike the authentic slippers i have just saying ugg from my understanding they’re claiming ugg because it using the same wool as ugg i noticed the the navy and the pinkish pair says by ugg while the other colors actually say ugg i am very disappointed by this its a knock off and shouldn’t be the same price as the original
customer_reviews.author: Jenee

customer_reviews.title: Fits really tight right away
customer_reviews.text: These fit one size smaller right away but try wearing them like 5 or 6 times and then they fit perfectly. Glad I didnt exchange them for a bigger size!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Size up for wide feet!
customer_reviews.text: Since there has been nowhere to go in the last few weeks I’ve been living in these slippers since they arrived. Thanks to reviews that said to order a size up and the Amazon wardrobe policy I ordered both an 8 and a 9. I generally wear an 8 but have a wide foot and high instep. I ended up keeping the 9 and returning the 8. The band around the mouth is not flexible and I could hardly get the 8 on. I worry about stretch, but the 9 doesn’t have to stretch. I really like the slippers and definitely recommend ordering a size up.
customer_reviews.author: MerMac

customer_reviews.title: Size up!
customer_reviews.text: I am SOO glad that I read the reviews. I am a size 9 in my regular tall Ugg boots. So I assumed I’d buy the same size in these slippers but after reading the reviews I knew I better order a size up. So I ordered a size 10, they’re a bit snug getting on but fit perfect once on, definetly can’t just slid into them...I’m assuming they’ll stretch a bit if not no big deal :)! Totally worth every dime!
customer_reviews.author: lukifer24

customer_reviews.title: Snuggly and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear around the house as slippers, but they could definitely be worn outside. The sole is quite sturdy and they feel like they are constructed very well. Only complaint I have is they're a bit snug, not sure if that is from the fur lining and needing to "break them in". They tend to pull my socks down. However this is minor. I made sure to spray them with a leather and suede protector before wearing them for the first time. I expect I will have these for a while.
customer_reviews.author: MzKitty421

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Slippers, But Comfy and Fit Well!
customer_reviews.text: Both my daughter and niece asked for the Ugg Tasman slippers for Christmas, and both wear the same size (US 7). The chestnut color is warm and attractive and both girls reported that the slippers fit well and are cozy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle Lofton

customer_reviews.title: Item is not Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Item is not AUTHENTIC The real uggs are the same price as your fake ones
customer_reviews.author: So The Great 🌻

customer_reviews.title: Runs a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: I do not think these are authentic. I bought them in a half size larger - just like I do for all of my UGGs, but these feel as if they are an half size small than my regular shoe size. They only reason that I am not sending them back is because I am going to give them to my daughter who wears a smaller size then I do. Overall, the slippers look good
customer_reviews.author: Ms NancyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: So warm!
customer_reviews.text: These are super warm and cute! If you have a very high arch, you might not be able to fit your arch in these shoes. Mine was tight the first few days I wore them but it loosened. I have a high arch but not super high.
customer_reviews.author: Katjaye

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think this are authentic!
customer_reviews.text: Question authenticity of this slippers, bought them in color black as a Xmas gift for my daughter, she has wore them exclusively indoor as she has been hospitalized since the day after Xmas, this slippers stained her feet black and by Dec 30th, the color has vanished horribly & look super old. I’m not returning them and claiming my money back just because we’ve both wore them for a comfy hospital stay but definitely do not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: LTapia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect present!
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a present to my mom, she LOVES them! Originally she had been given her brothers that he didn’t use anymore, but they were already warn out and she wore them right down. Though she refused to get other slippers because they were so comfy for her. I went behind her back and got her a new pair that she fell heads over heels with. She comes home every day from work and puts them on immediately. Not because we have a strict shoes in the house rule, but because it makes her relax and know she’s home. I’d buy her a million pairs of she needed it because it’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Either make it with no heel or a bigger one.
customer_reviews.text: Granted, Uggs aren't really made for larger footed mammals. They are for dainty little yoga pants stay at homers with nothing to do but show off their Uggs. The size is correct but I could not keep them on my feet. I lost one walking down the street and that was at a slow pace, I can't even imagine if I had been really hoofing it what would've happened.
customer_reviews.author: KKa

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bough these for my daughter in-law. I received a pair last year and will never wear anything else. So comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I understand now why alot of people love these shoes/slippers! Very comfortable, warm. Love the light grey and tan soles. I ordered a 8 and they fit like a 8. If you want to wear socks with them order up. Will be purchasing more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki1245

customer_reviews.title: Slippers?
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to run a little smaller than my UGG boots so if you're debating sizes, I'd go up rather than down. I would not have bought these as slippers - my husband bought them for me for Mother's Day. I'm interpreting the word "slipper" to mean "slip-on" because everything about these is identical to my boots, including the sole. For that reason, I plan to wear them as winter clogs rather than indoor slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeside Mom

customer_reviews.title: Black dye staining my toes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn UGG slippers for many years. Something seems off with these. The sole isn’t as comfy as I expected, but the worse thing is it’s staining my toes and toenails black! It’s hard to scrub off! I don’t get it, for the price, it shouldn’t do that. I bought them back in June so I would have them for the colder weather, and just recently started wearing them. Anyone else getting black dyed toes?
customer_reviews.author: bonita hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Indoor/Outdoor "Slippers"
customer_reviews.text: UGGS are about the only slippers I can wear because of the lambswool lining. Any synthetic liners in other slippers cause my feet to sweat that they get cold, especially on cold days. My feet are comfortable and toasty warm. The soles allow me to step outside to either get the paper, put out the trash or bring in the mail. Oh, and let out the dog in the yard. They fit perfectly and stay on my feet. Until the lambswool is worn down, I cannot wear socks yet. But that isn't really necessary, they do such a good job keeping my feet warm and dry. I love UGGS shoes.
customer_reviews.author: USAF Veteran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for winter in Florida!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for winter in Florida! They seemed a little bit snug, but by the end of the day they were just right. The fluffiness inside is just what I needed since this year we actually have a fall season. My feet have been chilly, but not with these! They are quickly becoming my new favorite shoes! I wear them everywhere, and I don't want to take them off when I get home!
customer_reviews.author: J. Coburn

customer_reviews.title: Follow the size recommendations!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th pair of Uggs since they became popular years ago and despite being a solid 8.5 I’ve always been an Ugg 8. Amazon and Zappos both recommended that I purchase a 9 and I was skeptical at first but they were so right. I have a very narrow foot with a high in-step and size nine is perfect. So happy with these and if you have any doubts, I can assure you that these are the genuine article. No fakes here. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Silver Shoes

customer_reviews.title: Not for Me
customer_reviews.text: These just did not work for me at all. I typically buy LL Bean have been disappointed with how the shearling doesn't last so I decided to try these. I slid them on and instantly knew they would not work. They were too snug, I ordered a 9 (my normal size) and have a narrow foot. They feel too low on the back of my foot. I felt like I was stomping every time I walked because there was no flexibility on the bottoms. Needless to say, they went back immediately. Bought the Dearform Boot Slippers instead, and I absolutely love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh sweet relief
customer_reviews.text: I am recovering from two diabetic ulcers and a toe amputation plus a torn achiles tendon repair the wounds healed but the foot is missing a section of heel and a toe. Received an orthotic shoe and a brace which were extremely uncomfortable and started to create sores. Looked everywhere for a comfortable supportive non restrictive shoe found this. Best money ever spent. Wool is cushioning and supportive and thick tread wonderful. Works like a charm recommended footwear for all diabetics.
customer_reviews.author: adele

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable potatoes on her feet
customer_reviews.text: My 13-year old got a pair for xmas last year & I just bought her a second, identical pair in a larger size. She loves them -- wears them all the time. They are durable (despite 4x weekly use in winter, they are still in good shape for her younger sisters). She says they do take a little time to mold to her feet -- she wore with a pair of socks for a week, then dropped the socks because she said they were perfect. While they aren't my taste -- she loved them so much that we even got the identical color this time.
customer_reviews.author: LACE

customer_reviews.title: looks nice but heel slips off
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are super cute but the soles are really stiff. The stiff soles were to be expected, but since they don't flex and the foot opening is so big, the heel slips off with each step. So the slippers wind up being more like slides, which I didn't want. They were cute and well made but the style was not for me and I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: karkar

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed in these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed in these shoes, especially considering they cost $100. I have owned multiple pairs of Uggs and ordered my usual size in these but they just feel too big and flop off. Also, when I am wearing these my socks always get pulled down and it hurts my feet. I live in NYC so I need shoes that are comfortable to walk in. These aren't them. I still gave 3 stars because I love the style and how cute they are.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these SO much. They last forever and are pretty much the only thing that keep my feet warm. Keep in mind that with UGG type shoes, i.e those with shearling lining, are 1) made to be worn without socks, 2) will stretch overtime and the shearling will smush down. For these reasons they are supposed to be tight when you first get them. I was told to always get them even 1/2 smaller to accommodate these 2 variables. As expected, they were tight for the 1st week but are slowly getting to the perfect size and shape. I've had them about 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: vivzs

customer_reviews.title: Just bought another pair, one size up, of course!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!! I am a little picky when it comes to house slippers so I read all the reviews prior to purchase. I ordered a size up because the majority of the reviews were regarding the slipper running small. I normally wear a 6.5 so I ordered a 7 and they fit perfectly! My feet are loving these house slippers. There is soft, fuzzy, fur (fake), wrapping top to bottom, toe to heel making my feet very happy! I am very happy and I would highly recommend these, in fact, I just bought a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: o2b_moi

customer_reviews.title: I love them! at first
customer_reviews.text: I love them! at first, the right foot seemed too small I almost sent them back but I decided I would wear them inside a few days to see if the right one would break in and it did there awesome now so comfy, true story with my job I have to wear steel-toed boots whewww soI had been on my job right at 3 months the bones literally hurt in my feet but I am here to tell you these slippers made a huge difference while wearing them as much as I could when I returned home from my job, the support is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Zappos has zero quality control
customer_reviews.text: They arrived used and by someone with very large feet. It looked like their toes were still in there from the outside. Cone on Zappos, look at the returns. You should not have ever sent these out. Very gross!
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Total comfort
customer_reviews.text: If you want a shoe to wear around the house that will cosset your weary foot in comfort, this is the one. I wear them all year round, but they are at their best in winter. I purchased these to replace a pair my husband bought for me in Australia 30 years ago. I've purchased other slippers, but none really compare to Uggs for comfort and practicality. Not a big fan of wearing them out in public, but you could. Plan on buying a second pair so when these wear out, I won't have to agonize on what to find to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Hollis Storm

customer_reviews.title: Slipper Runs Big
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers! Perfect for walking around the house. I originally had ordered these shoes in a Size 8 and the back of my heel was coming up when I walked. I had to return the slippers and reorder them in a Size 7. I am usually a size 8 but have found with Ugg products I am a size smaller. I wish Ugg had half sizes but they don't. Great quality and very comfy but be prepared to go a size down. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Slippers
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them, so comfortable. They also keep her feet warm
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nicely-made, run a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I like that these are well made, soft lining, warm, and have a good grippy sole. I usually wear 7 1/2, and after reading other reviews I ordered size 8. It's a good thing, because they're still a little snug in the toes (when wearing socks), though I expect them to eventually stretch to fit. They also are a bit loose at the heel, so my foot comes up at the heel with each step. It didn't bother me enough to send them back, though I would have preferred a snugger fit at the heel to keep that from happening.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Marx

customer_reviews.title: Love My Ugg Slippers!
customer_reviews.text: I just spent $100 on another pair of slippers from Europe. Last minute, I asked my boyfriend for Ugg boots for Christmas. I am 45, live in S CA and have never had a pair of Uggs before (I always thought they were too trendy/sloppy). He got me the Uggs and they are the most comfortable, warm, cozy boots for winter. I instantly had to have a pair of Ugg slippers, so I bought these and I wear them daily. I work from home and sometimes I don't even put on shoes.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferB.isMe

customer_reviews.title: feel just like my boots
customer_reviews.text: I really love these so far. they fit just like my boots. however, the color was a lot dark than the photos; more of a plum purple rather than a maroon purple color. no biggy tho. i did go with a size up so i could wear socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: JMag

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: The amazing part of these most comfortable and attractive slippers is that I wear them without socks and my feet do not sweat nor smell, thanks to the genuine shearling inside. I really look forward to coming home after a hard days work, taking off my socks and slipping these slippers on. What a luxurious feeling. I am regularly a size 8.5 but with no half sizes, I ordered an 8 and they fit perfectly. After a few days of breaking in, they are even stretching out for a little extra toe room. The apparent quality in materials and stitching lead me to believe they will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Convert!
customer_reviews.text: I've been very anti-Uggs due to the over exorbitant prices, but finally caved and bought these to replace a pair of Bearpaw slippers that finally gave in. I have to concede... these slippers are so darn comfortable and much more sturdy feeling then any bearpaw boots/slippers I've owned in the past. We shall see how they hold up, but so far I really love them! I'm typically size 7.5 but purchased size 7 and they fit great after a couple of days of packing down the lambs wool.
customer_reviews.author: Shiloah Dumler

customer_reviews.title: Dyed my feet black 😳
customer_reviews.text: These DO run on the smaller side upon first wear - but they expand after the first couple wears. Just a heads up though - no need to size up. I own them in a different color and just got the black. I wore today and they died my feet black and the fur is coming out and sticking to my feet when I take them off. Hopefully this is just something that will happen the first few times I wear them - don’t remember the lining coming out of any other Ugg product after wearing. Otherwise, they’re very comfortable and a great slipper.
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers ever!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend these slippers to everyone. So comfortable to wear and great for inside the house on hard wood floors. I have had to replace the wool insoles but that is nothing knowing I'll be wearing these slippers for years. I did size up a size as I'm normally a size 8-8.5 so I went with the size 9 on recommendation and they are perfect. I've actually accidentally wore them to a store completely forgetting I was wearing slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real?? Not sure but they were tight
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not sure if these were real Ugg’s, I bought the same size I always wear on these yet these were tight. I didn’t read reviews prior to buying, didn’t think I had to. But when they were right I came back to read the reviews and I was definitely skeptical so I returned them for a refund. Rather shop on ugg website as the price is the same anyway
customer_reviews.author: Christina Robbins

customer_reviews.title: not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The toe box is so low and tight that my big toe turned black. Had to buy shoe stretchers for them and not working. Just bought some stuff to spray on them. Also for the price , you would thing they would come in half sizes, A size 9 is too big and the size 8 is too tight. Very disappointed with UGG. Thought they work Ok. Cant return them since I wore them and bled some inside. hope spray on stuff may work. Shame on UGG for making an inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: Lorry Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Very happy --
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th pair of UGG slippers in our household. Each pair is long-wearing and they become true-to-size, after a few days wearing. The traction is great with the thick, cleated sole and they are easy to clean with a nylon brush and soapy water. Best of all, the lamb's skin lining does not deteriorate after extensive wearing. These are the longest wearing slippers we've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: RWHPI

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, my daughter has been wearing UGGs for years now, and I never really got the "fad".. but she bought me these this year and I love them! I am home almost all day and slippers are a must. These are fabulous! They for my wide foot very well, give me some Arch support and keep my feet really warm in the winter! A bonus is that I can wear them out of I need to hop in the car quickly.
customer_reviews.author: PureLuck

customer_reviews.title: I Wished I Bought Them Sooner
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted these shoes for a free years now. The price is so high, I just couldn’t justify it. I received a couple Amazon gift cards for Xmas, so I decided to go for it. I am so glad I did. They’re fantastic! I slip them on as soon as get home and don’t take them off until I leave again. They are warm, provide support for my plantar fasciitis, and have a hard sole to withstand taking the dog outside.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Howland

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, slippery bottom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as we have all hardwood floors in our house and sometimes barefoot isn't an option. They keep my feet warm, but not too hot and the fit is great. It took a little getting used to the lip at the heel of the slippers, as I have a high instep and my foot doesn't easily slide in. The big issue is that the bottom of these do not "grip" very well and can slide across the floor. At this price, this brand, I was expecting way better on the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Meagher

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE OF THIS SELLER
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! I ordered size 9. Received slippers marked size 9. I started tripping and fell while wearing them and measured them against the sole of my other size 9 Ugg slippers. They were considerably longer like a size 10 or 11. By the time it figured it out I had worn them for 4 months. I asked to return them as the size was not correct. I was told by the SELLER I could not return them because they had been worn. So I'm out $100 and have no slippers to wear. Not at all happy with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Dean

customer_reviews.title: Even with thick ankles and feet, these are great once broken in
customer_reviews.text: The top band was very tight when I first got them, but i squeezed me fat foot in them and now they're much better. The colorful stitching i think is what made them tight but it does loosen. I have lymphedema so my ankles and feet swell daily but i wear these every day because they fit nice now. Great price too so I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Linkins

customer_reviews.title: I have cold feet, need I say more.........
customer_reviews.text: I have waited a long time for the price to drop, and drop it did. Amazon had them waiting just for me. Uggs are my best cozy friend on a winter day, or spring and fall. This is the warmest slipper, last year I bought the Ugg mini boot, just about wore them out. Now I can wear the slippers, I have two other pair of boots. I am 60 years old and have owned these shoes since they first came out, they never wear out.
customer_reviews.author: chery

customer_reviews.title: Run just slightly small for me
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 6.5 with no half sizes I ordered a 7 and glad I did a 7 is actually a little tight and short on the big toe a 7.5 would be great but I think an 8 would be too big. I do know from having many pairs of uggs they do streatch out after a while so in a few weeks I think these will be fine. Always good quality
customer_reviews.author: Katie Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Total comfort and warmth
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful indoor/outdoor slip-on shoe. It is very sturdy and well made. The sole is pretty thick, so it’s more of a shoe than a slipper. I am typically a size 8.5 in shoes but find Ugg a bit tight. I got this shoe in a 9 and it is not a loose fit. I would buy the same shoe in the same size again— this has become my go to shoe for cold days and, although it’s got a nice look to it, I keep it as a house shoe to keep my floors nice but my toes warm.
customer_reviews.author: Little Zooks

customer_reviews.title: Can run a size small
customer_reviews.text: This is a great slipper after I had to go up a size. My actual size which is a solid women's 11 felt tight and my heel was hanging off the back uncomfortably. Once I went up to a 12 it made a world of a difference. Even after the slipper was broken in it still fit comfortably. Recommend going up just a size.
customer_reviews.author: TC in CT

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this slipper, my first was three years ago, the gray and they hold up well, worn them shopping in all weather. When you get them treat with a water proof spray. I also treat them with the cleaner form time to time to keep the nap. I have to say the sole hold up also.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Moody

customer_reviews.title: Size up!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 6 in almost any brand of shoe, sometimes smaller in flats. But the 6 was too small. Yes there is a lot of fluff on the inside that needs to be worn in to fit your foot but I could see my toes already pressing against the edge of the shoe. The 7 fits much better! So size up a whole size not a half size. Haven’t worn them for a long time but so far the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kbiggs

customer_reviews.title: Defective slipper - poor quality -past 30 days how do I get replacements
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED MY OLD PAIR - NEW PAIR DEFECTIVE. I loved my old pair which I had for about 5 years. I ordered a new pair and kept getting a sore spot on my toe. Finally looked closely and the slipper is defective there is a missing section of sheep fur. HOW DO I GET REPLACEMENT? It is past 30 days - I want to replace these. Please advise - for UGG"S and $100 I certainly expect better. Let's please get this resolved.
customer_reviews.author: well read

customer_reviews.title: These may be the best all around slipper
customer_reviews.text: These may be the best all around slipper. They are pricey but last. My first pair are 5 years old and still going strong. I bought these just to have a different color. They are comfortable but not cushioned. Size is true. They give support which is mice for seniors.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF COUNTERFEITS!
customer_reviews.text: I knew as soon as I opened the box these were counterfeit. Please check your item when it arrives for the QR code and the proper features. Don’t rely on the R next to the name UGG. I am returning an ordered another pair. I will update when they arrive. UPDATE: new pair came today. This time I ordered chestnut. Also a knock-off. Do yourselves a favor. Buy them on the OFFICIAL UGG site. Same price. Free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Glo B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful slippers, but beware of the fur coloring staining your feet
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and ordered in black - and the slippers looked and fit well, however, the fur was staining the skin on my feel each and every time I wore the slippers, and the dye was really hard to wash off. So, I exchanged for a slipper in natural color - and so far no issue with staining
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Turn your feet black
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to buy these slippers until I noticed that they turned my feet jet black, on top of foot and bottom. Very hard to wash off. Scrubbing hardly worke either. Why would an expensive slipper do this? I have a white carpet and my house is on the market! One reviewer said she wears socks with hers to keep feet from turning black. I shouldn't have to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Best Bedroom Slipper
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of warm slippers this winter. These are very good slippers. My only problem is the toe area which doesn't seem to have as much padding that touch my toes. I kind of put a small piece of cotton in and they stay warm. Otherwise, these are the best slippers I have ever owned and I will not worry about cold mornings anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was so delighted to find these on Amazon. Nordstrom was sold out so I took a chance and Googled them. They are absolutely perfect as an alternative to LL Bean's "wicked good" slippers. It takes a few days to be able to slip them on easily as the back is a little higher than I'm used to, but they are now broken in and stretched out just enough to make them perfect. I'm a size 9 and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: EJK

customer_reviews.title: Really nice slippers
customer_reviews.text: I really like these slippers. They run small as I am a size 9 normally and had to get a 10. They are really comfortable and warm. They are so comfortable I forget Im wearing them and almost left the housr with them a few times. They are also so warm that I can't wear them unless temp outside is 40 or below bc my feet get too hot even without socks. They are well made and should last. Overall they were what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I had these years ago when they first came out and the fit perfect. I wish they were still like
customer_reviews.text: The quality seemed ok but the heel was loose and my foot kept coming out of it. I had these years ago when they first came out and the fit perfect. I wish they were still like that
customer_reviews.author: Pattiryan

customer_reviews.title: Cloud comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this style of Ugg slipper. They are very comfortable (like wearing clouds on your feet), and wear well. I still wear my first pair but keep them by the door for quick runs outside. My new pair is strictly for indoors. I noticed my new pair have a bit lower heel. It makes it so much easier to don and doff. Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: drbanks

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These cute little clog like shoes are adorable. I wear them with 7/8 black leggings from Pink Victoria Secret and just a cute little top. Not sure what other reviewers are talking about with size. I'm a standard size 7 and wear a 6 in these however I do have a narrow foot.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn G.

customer_reviews.title: These are great, just 1 thing I don't like
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. They feel fantastic and they're perfect for throwing on when you wanna do laundry or walk outside to get something. The only thing I don't like about them is that if you wear them with socks they pull your socks down A LOT. Like my socks end up in the middle of my foot under my arch. It's definitely because of the fur but I don't like to wear these without socks so it's kind of a struggle. Anyway, if you wanna wear these without socks they are flawless. Wearing them with socks is tuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kiely

customer_reviews.title: They stretch! Super comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be discouraged if they are difficult to put on at First because they really stretch out after a little bit of wear. They’re super warm and comfy and I am so happy I decided to splurge on a nice pair of slippers after my old ones finally made their way to the trash. These are fantastic and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great forever slippers!
customer_reviews.text: Love them!! Practical, comfy, & last forever. Great color & can be worn outside too. Only reason for not giving 5 stars is Ugg price-point. would’t have bought them if they weren’t on sale.
customer_reviews.author: jan Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loving my new slippers. They were more than I normally spend but they are super soft and comfortable. I am normally a 7.5 but I bought the 8 based on other comments. I think this is the right size, assuming they don't stretch much (I have been wearing them for a week or two now for a number of hours each day). They are loose enough to slide on and off easily and my toe is where it should be. They are just loose enough in the back to slide on and off without being problematic, which is why I say that I am hoping they don't stretch much beyond the initial wearings. They are perfect now.
customer_reviews.author: tracy n.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold your foot in the slipper
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed in this slipper . I love Uggs and own 3 pair of the street boots. However these slippers felt so wrong on my feet . They kept slipping off my feet since there is no real support to hold them in place . Not my kind of slipper and definitely not fir this kind of money . I returned .
customer_reviews.author: Let’s go out in nature !

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but a little big
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers! I bought the same pair for my boyfriend but I think they’re super cute on girls! They’re so comfortable and I can wear them at any time. They are warm during the cold months. The only issue I face is that they are just a little big and it’s easy to trip/stumble when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelynn

customer_reviews.title: Happy Tootsies!
customer_reviews.text: I had been wearing a pair of hand-me-down UGGs until the toes were poking thru and the tread was worn bare. I worried that I would not find another pair as resilient or comfortable. I didn't have a clue if they were Mens, or women or even what size they were. So you can imagine how elated I was to find them in black here at Amazon! If you have problematic tootsies that need a gentle arch, slight structure and comfy fluff for your feet to behave, these are the slippers for you!
customer_reviews.author: S. Gresham

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for a 21 year old. She never had any kind of Uggs before and was shocked when she opened the box. She wears them (practically) everywhere. The fit is good, and they are super comfy. Highly recommend as a gift, even if it's a gift for yourself!!
customer_reviews.author: Yoli from NJ

customer_reviews.title: It’s Ugg’s
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I wear them a shoes! I do however put a waterproofing and stain preventing spray on them before I wear them for the first time and it makes a huge difference in how new looking they stay
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy structure sacrifices a little comfort
customer_reviews.text: Doctor said I needed a more sturdy slipper, so purchased this. It has great structure but of course, not as comfy as the flexible moccasins I was used to. True to size fit. Big toe box, nice arch support. They look huge on my feet and I look like Herman Munster, so not lovin that, (thus the 3 starts) but will keep bc its time to take care of my feet
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love love these shoes! They are so warm and comfortable. I plan on wearing them outside because I love the way they look with jeans. I will be wearing them often.
customer_reviews.author: mareman1

customer_reviews.title: I wear slippers all the time so I do like a slipper that is kinda like a shoe that ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear slippers all the time so I do like a slipper that is kinda like a shoe that I can wear everywhere. I used to buy dear foams but because I wear them So much they only last a few months before I feel the ground on my feet. I was a little hesitant about spending 100$ for slippers,but I have a couple pair of ugg boots that are my favs. but I tell you I am glad I did. I’m sure I’ve spent 100$ on slippers in the past year 20$ here and 30$ there. Anyways great slipper gonna get my mom some for her birthday.❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Moore

customer_reviews.title: warmth, durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my girlfriend and she loves them. U can walk outside with them and they are easily removabl. She says they are equally soft and can't wait to wear them in the winter. As she wears them now also
customer_reviews.author: Eric kissinger

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up for comfort!
customer_reviews.text: It's comfy and very warm. I bought a size 11 and it's perfect. It is roomy and Still has a lot of room to wear socks if I feel like it. I'm glad I didn't buy a size smaller. Mind u... if you choose a size 10... you probably wouldn't be able to wear socks with it & your may feel abit constricted.
customer_reviews.author: saj

customer_reviews.title: Wear these all the time.
customer_reviews.text: I am needed to buy a size larger than I usually do for a good fit. This shoe should not fit tightly, to allow your foot to breath in the lining. I wear them all the time, but mostly for running short errands or around the house. There isn't any support or cushioning for walking long distances, but I didn't expect there would be.
customer_reviews.author: Latte

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers
customer_reviews.text: I'm always satisfied with UGG products. These are my 4th pair of Tasman. My 2 old ones have a slit in the side of the left slipper that I cut to accommodate a Bunionette. I wanted a pair of new, uncut black to wear when I wanted to look nice. These are comfortable and can handle going out and not just be used as a slipper. Happy feet!
customer_reviews.author: Jannynet

customer_reviews.title: UGG slippers
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. I ordered the wrong size so returned them but I have been wearing these for years and won't wear anything else. They are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great slipper, it's made of thicker leather like the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great slipper, it's made of thicker leather like the older Uggs. Very comfortable and the fit reminds me of a ballet flat because your heel stays put. I can wear a 6.5 or 7 in the newest Uggs and the 7 fit well for me in this. I compared it to another new pair of Ugg boots I have in size 6.5 and they're the same length. I recommend picking the larger size if you're debating between two.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole E.

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: product was delivered on time and shoe fit my grand daughter perfect. She loved them
customer_reviews.author: Judy T

customer_reviews.title: UGGS all the way
customer_reviews.text: I finally gave in and splurged after having spent too much money on other brands. You get what you pay for! I love these slippers and I am so happy I got them to wear indoors, all day.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Look great, super comfortable, great fit
customer_reviews.text: I gave these UGGs as a gift and they were a big hit. My friend usually wears a size 7.5, but since these don’t come in half sizes, I got a size 8 and they fit perfectly. They look great, and apparently they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JulieN

customer_reviews.title: Black bleeds
customer_reviews.text: The feel and fit are pretty good but a word of caution on the black: they turn my feed black too. I've not yet worn them with socks.
customer_reviews.author: T. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes/slippers. Comfy. Run a bit large. I wear them as a slipper and sometimes as a shoe if I am running a quick errand. Warm.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Miller

customer_reviews.title: Extremely soft and comfy but slips off heel
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are soft, comfortable, luxe feeling, warm, and overall just the best slippers you could ask for. Except... they slip off my heel. I have tried two sizes and they both have the same problem. Don't let my review stop you from trying them. See if they fit your foot better than mine. They really are great slippers.
customer_reviews.author: sarahbellum

customer_reviews.title: I love ugg. I’ve always been a 7 but for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love ugg. I’ve always been a 7 but for some reason this was somewhat small. I still kept it and I still wear them all the time. :)
customer_reviews.author: Emma Lombardy

customer_reviews.title: Too small :(
customer_reviews.text: I have about 10 pairs of Uggs all different styles. I'm normally a size 10 but I always order a size 9 in Uggs. I thought this would be the case for the slippers -but no. They are so tight ! They pinch my toes -my left big toe actually hurts just from trying these on! My heel actually slips out the back-so they are too small yet too big? Bummed -I loved the shoes but they won't work for me! I guess I won't be able to buy Ugg slippers....
customer_reviews.author: Andi C

customer_reviews.title: Comfy , warm
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfy I went a size up after reading some reviews and they do fit but they are a bit loose in the back where the heel goes I wear socks with it to make it more tight just not sure if these will get loose after wearing them for awhile and then be too big for me
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Bought these as a gift for my daughter-in-law and she ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my daughter-in-law and she loves them. As a matter of fact, she specifically asked for these because she received a pair 10+ years ago and finally wore them out! (P.S. - My son has the same story...he loves his Men's Ugg Tasman's too!!) They are both 40-something.
customer_reviews.author: Nana2Six

customer_reviews.title: Stained my feet black during first two months of wear, durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Too bad these bled onto my bare feet for the first couple months of wear. Hoping the dye is not toxic as I've been unable to remove the stains from my feet even after soaking in the tub. Would not have expected this from such a supposed quality brand and for what is cost! Website say to wipe clean, no machine washing so will have to wait and see if dye stops bleeding at some point on it's own. Seem to be well-made over all. Will see what they look like at the end of the winter season.
customer_reviews.author: Conscious Eater

customer_reviews.title: COMFORT
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT SHOE, SIZE IS ACCURATE. PURCHASED SIZE 8, FITS AS EXPECTED. I AM GIVING IT 4 STARS-BECAUSE ITEM DIDNT SHIP IN TIME FOR CHRISTMAS, I RECEIVED AN EMAI STATING MY ITEM WAS GOING TO ARRIVE LATE, BUT THATS OK- WELL WORTH THE PURCHASE. VERY COMFORTABLE SHOE.
customer_reviews.author: MartinaA

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my daughter, she loves them. She said they are so comfortable. I wanted to try them on to see how they felt but I have to high of an in step and arch so I couldn’t get my foot in.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: To Small
customer_reviews.text: I would size up they do run small. I ordered my normal size as some said the shoe stretches but when I received them the shoes length was to short. My toe was at the very tip of the shoe. I also didn’t feel the quality was up to par with what I know UGG is. It’s not a bad shoe just not what I was hoping for and for the price not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So warm and comfortable. A bit snug but will stretch as you wear. If you are going to wear thick wool socks perhaps buy a half size larger. Nice thick sole, have worn in a little snow and have a good grip
customer_reviews.author: KFitz

customer_reviews.title: The dye will ruin your socks and dye your feet
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, they are so comfortable and stylish. BUT- they dye EVERYTHING. I thought when i first got them, it was because it was a new product and it would ware off eventually. Its been 2 1/2 months and they dye every single pair of socks i have worn. Dont even dare to ware them sockless, they WILL DYE YOUR FEET.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Rafuse

product_meta.title: UGG Women's Tasman Slipper
product_meta.description: Slipper.Footwear Sizing Guide - Draw a straight line, longer than your foot, on a piece of paper. Place the paper on a flat surface. Stand on the line with your heel and longest toe centered on the line. If measuring a child's foot, it may be easier to hold the paper up to their foot. Place a mark on the line at the tip of the longest toe and at the back of the heel.Repeat steps the for the other foot. Measure the distance between the marks. Taking the larger of the two measurements, use the conversion chart to find your correct shoe size
feature_bullets: Vamp and quarters lined with fur. UGGpure wool insole. Contains real fur from sheep or lamb
